activities: Customer data is defined as parent, student, staff, and other data provided to ParentLink by authorized school and school district personnel, and includes, but is not limited to, demographic, grade, assignment, communication, library, transportation, cafeteria, employee, and other  information.  Customer information is provided to the ParentLink service via secure file transfer from the educational organizations we serve, as well as by way of manual user entry via online account management interface.
personaldata: On- and off-line data, manually processed data.
